name: microsandbox (zerocore-ai)
description: [项目级] opensource self-hosted sandboxes for ai agents。来源: https://github.com/zerocore-ai/microsandbox

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
opensource self-hosted sandboxes for ai agents

来源: https://github.com/zerocore-ai/microsandbox
语言: Rust
Stars: 4809

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

CLOUD_HOSTING.md
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content: - **Strong Isolation**: Hardware-level VM isolation with [microVMs](./MSB_V_DOCKER.md). - **Instant Startup**: Boot times under 200 ms. - **OCI Compatible**: Runs standard container images. - **Self-Hosted**: Deploy within your infrastructure with autonomy. -
